briefTitle: Feasibility of Ambulatory Surgery for Early Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Same Day Discharge After Surgery for Early Breast Cancer - a Feasible Option
conditions: Early Breast Cancer, Psychosocial Wellbeing, Ambulatory Surgery
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer \< 2cm
* Clinically node negative
* ASA I-II

Exclusion Criteria:

* Axillary clearance performed
* ASA III-IV
* No adult companion at home
